item.title: Backyard Observatory - Weather
item.description: Over the 5 years I've lived in this house, I've found that I have a decent amount of clear skies. It's not the summit of Maunakea, but it is enough to be useful. On the other hand, wind and blowing rain will likely be a major problem for an observatory …
item.dc:creator: Josh Walawender

item.title: Backyard Observatory - Introduction
item.description: I've been dreaming of building a backyard observatory since I got hooked on astronomy as kid. I remember dreaming of building a dome and putting it in the backyard of my parents house. Building it was way beyond my capabilities at the time of course, but here I am almost …
item.dc:creator: Josh Walawender
